scripts.buildhugo: if [ $(go env GOOS) = 'linux' ] || [ $(go env GOOS) = 'android' ]; then if [ $(go env GOARCH) = 'amd64' ] || [ $(go env GOARCH) = 'arm64' ]; then (go clean -C hugo && export CGO_ENABLED=1 AR=llvm-ar-16 CC=clang-16 CXX=clang++-16 && go build -C hugo -ldflags='-s -w' --tags extended -o ../bin/$(go env GOARCH)/hugo && upx --best --lzma ./bin/$(go env GOARCH)/hugo); else echo 'Unsupported Arch Version'; fi else echo 'Unsupported OS Version'; fi
scripts.buildtest: npm run buildjs && ./bin/$(go env GOARCH)/hugo --gc --minify -d test
scripts.debug: npm run buildjs && ./bin/$(go env GOARCH)/hugo server --gc -D --environment production
scripts.deploy: npm run buildjs && rm -f -r docs && ./bin/$(go env GOARCH)/hugo --gc --minify -d docs && git add docs && git commit -S -s -m 'docs: Re-generate fixes'
